profile:
MOORE SKYLIGHTS is based in Toronto, Ontario. We have been repairing and replacing every type, style, and size of skylight for over a decade! Our services are available but not limited to Durham Region, York Region, and the GTA. Our mission is to enhance your lifestyle and property by installing, repairing, and replacing your skylight(s). We know that your quality of life is affected by your surroundings, so let us enhance the environment you're living in. Call us today for a free estimate and inspection! Toronto Skylight Replacement
 
- Skylight Repairs
- Skylight Replacements
- Sun Tunnel Installations
- Skylight Installations
- Roof Repair
- Attic/Loft Conversions
- Cathedral Ceilings
- Other Home Services...

GUARANTEE
 
Are you tired of spending money only to end up with more problems than when you first started? Call the repair/replacement specialists today! We care about our work, our clients, and treat every job as if it were our only one. The most important part of our job other than leak proof skylights, is having happy customers who love the work done to their residence.   
 
Whether repairing small simple skylights or replacing larger, more detailed units, we execute every job with confidence, customer care, and most importantly a leak proof skylight. We personally offer a full 10 year guarantee on our workmanship. This is in addition to a 20 year manufacturers warranty on glass seal failure. Call today for a free estimate and inspection of your skylight(s). Thank you for considering Moore Skylights.

profile:
City roofing and aluminum co. has been in business since 1994, over all these years, our extreme commitment to excellence and customer service make us one of the most trusted name in the roofing industry.
Our roofing department offers residential and commercial services including re-roofing; new roof construction and retro-fitting, we install a wide range of materials such as asphalt shingles, metal roofing, composite roof and cedar wood shakes.
Our aluminum department offers complete aluminum product.s and sheet metal work, our crews utilizes state of art tools and equipment to install aluminum soffit, fascia, seamless eavestrough and rainware accessories.
Whatâ€™s more, in addition to providing re-roofing services and new construction work, we also offer roofing repair services, on-going maintenance service, and roofing inspection consultations.  These services are designed to extend the life of your roof by identifying and fixing the minor problems before they become major issues.
name: City Roofing & Aluminum Co.

profile:
Re-Roofing Ontario is a family owned and operated roofing and home improvement company servicing the Greater Toronto Area.  Our expertise includes residential and commercial projects, maintenance and repair of existing roof systems, the installation of seamless gutters and advanced fastening systems and all types of custom aluminum and copper work.

Over the years, the reputation of roofers throughout the Greater Toronto area has suffered due to poor installers, the use of inferior quality materials, and the start up of fly-by-night companies.  It is our goal to revitalize the roofing industry's reputation, by providing the highest quality service and products for our customers.

We take your needs as seriously as you do.  From the smallest leak to a complete re-roofing project, we deliver the same professionalism, dedication and quality. We believe our service and quality provides our customers with piece of mind in knowing that the roof they are purchasing will provide superior weather protection today and for many years to come.
 
Call us for a free quote today at (416) 899-4518! Requests can also be made through our website.
